name: Dazing Assault

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Str 13, Power Attack, base attack bonus +11.

sections.body: You can choose to take a –5 penalty on all melee attack rolls and combat maneuver checks to daze opponents you hit with your melee attacks for 1 round, in addition to the normal damage dealt by the attack. A successful Fortitude save negates the effect. The DC of this save is 10 + your base attack bonus. You must choose to use this feat before making the attack roll, and its effects last until your next turn.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You can daze foes with wild attacks.
